summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Umiri.me Serbian mood tracking app. All backend APIs functional, frontend pages load correctly with proper Serbian localization, authentication works, mood entry/saving/export works, AI tips generate successfully.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with Serbian text and Google login button
Backend API /api/ returns correct response
Backend API /api/mood-types returns 8 Serbian mood types
Auth flow with session creation and /api/auth/me works
POST /api/moods creates mood entries successfully
GET /api/moods retrieves mood entries
GET /api/moods/calendar/2026/2 returns calendar data
GET /api/moods/stats returns proper statistics
GET /api/moods/export returns CSV file with Serbian headers
GET /api/gamification/stats returns badges and streak data
POST /api/ai/tips returns AI-generated tips using GPT-5.2
Dashboard loads with Serbian greeting and proper layout
Mood entry page shows 8 emoji mood selection grid
Mood selection and note input functionality works
Mood saving and redirect to dashboard works
Calendar page loads with month navigation
Statistics page loads (shows empty state when no data)
Profile page shows badges and export functionality
Data export (CSV) downloads successfully
Navigation sidebar works across all pages
All Serbian text displays correctly throughout app
AI tip generation works and displays properly

success_percentage.integration: 100% (Auth, mood saving, export, navigation all working)
